titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax exemption for distilled spirits used for hand sanitizer.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax exemption for distilled spirits used for hand sanitizer.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill exempts alcohol used for hand sanitizers from the distilled spirits excise tax.
